EmailTemplate.name: ATR Messages.Executive Contact Plan 04.14.2015
EmailTemplate.subject: GAME ON, HONEYWELL!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<http://aerospace.honeywell.com/services> <https://twitter.com/Honeywell_Aero> <http://www.youtube.com/honeywell> <https://plus.google.com/109803702550636260475> <http://www.linkedin.com/company/honeywell-aerospace>
1: Log in and review the SFDC requirements and your assigned contacts in SalesForce <https://login.salesforce.com/>.
2: Make your contact.
3. Come back to SalesForce <https://login.salesforce.com/> and provide a brief recap of the contact experience and change the status of the task to “Complete”.
Included in the list of assigned activities you will notice assignments involving a POD. Although POD champions have not been assigned yet, click here <https://teamsites2013.honeywell.com/sites/ATR_CPS/ATR_CSO-InfoSys_Transition_Site/ATR%20CSO%20Transition/ATR%20-%20CSO%20and%20InfoSys%20Transition/What%20is%20a%20POD.pdf> to review what a POD is, and click here <https://teamsites2013.honeywell.com/sites/ATR_CPS/ATR_CSO-InfoSys_Transition_Site/ATR%20CSO%20Transition/ATR%20-%20CSO%20and%20InfoSys%20Transition/ATR%20POD%20Organizational%20Structure.xlsx> to view what airlines are assigned to each POD. Click here <https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/honeywell3/images/ExecutiveContactTraining.pdf> for SFDC Activities Training Instructions.
Still reading? CLOSE THIS EMAIL AND GO MAKE CONTACT!
